8.ara-name: كتاب الصوم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that :the Prophet said: "Do not precede the month with a day nor with two days, unless that fast falls on a day that one of you would have (normally) fasted. Fast with its sighting and break fast with its sighting, and if it is cloudy, then count for thirty days, and then break (the fast)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ لاَ تَقَدَّمُوا الشَّهْرَ بِصَوْمٍ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About: Do Not Precede The Month With Fasting
